misc.post: Bin laden did it and would do it again if given the chance. I can’t believe people still believe in these conspiracy theories. Watch his own confession..http://abcnews.go.com/WNT/t/video/osama-bin-laden-911-confession-13506877?ref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.ca%2F
